lyrics.stanza: Oh, who's like our Jesus? He's all we desire! His love draws us near—sets our spirits afire! We cannot but love Him—As one we proclaim: "Lord Jesus, we love Thee—exalt Thy dear name!"
O Jesus, our Jesus, how can we express Thy dearness, so precious, and Thy loveliness? When we see Thy beauty, all else fades away— All shadows must flee at the breaking of day!

We love Thee, we love Thee, we love Thee, O Lord. We love Thee, our Jesus, we love Thee, our God! We love Thee, we love Thee, and that Thou dost know; As we're in Thy presence, love for Thee will grow!
